Book Now Top Reasons to Stay Located on the Beach You'll be steps from six miles of pristine and expansive South Carolina coastline. Perfect for catching the morning sunrise, kayaking and paddle boarding, ocean swimming, and day after day of beachfront bliss. The Best Value in Isle of Palms You’ll save money while enjoying Isle of Palms’ best vacation value. Scroll up to see our best offers and discounts! Best of all, you can change or cancel your stay, penalty-free, up to 24 hours before your scheduled arrival. Next Door to The Windjammer You can’t get any closer to Isle of Palms’ most iconic beach bar and live music club! For a half-century, The Windjammer has been IOP’s stay-all-day gathering place for music, food, and laid-back fun. Walk to Nearby Restaurants & Bars You can take an easy stroll to Isle of Palms’ best restaurants, shops, and watering holes. Check out a few of our nearby favorites on our page. Things To Do Short Drive to Downtown Charleston You’ll be just minutes from Charleston’s landmarks, restaurants, and attractions, making it easy to take a break from the beach for a Lowcountry dinner, a horse-drawn carriage tour, or a shopping trip along King Street.

SKIP TO CONTENT Your Easy Beach Escape Welcome to Seaside Inn A beach lover’s dream getaway. Located in the heart of Isle of Palms, nextdoor to the Windjammer, and just minutes from Charleston, Seaside Inn is a 51-room boutique beachfront hotel embracing the casual come-as-you-are vibe local to the area. Featuring direct access to the beach, unbeatable proximity to local restaurants and bars, and comfortable guest rooms with ocean views, Seaside Inn offers exceptional value on South Carolina’s Lowcountry coast. Explore Our Offers Reasons To Stay Oceanfront Rooms Wake up to stunning ocean views and the soothing sounds of the coast right outside your window. Relax and unwind with a front-row seat to one of South Carolina’s most sought-out beaches. View Rooms Reasons To Stay Isle of Palms For Less Enjoy the beauty of Isle of Palms for less. Offering affordable beachfront accommodations, book a great value stay without sacrificing on comfort or location. Isle of Palms Seaside Inn is Located Here Wide beaches, casual restaurants, and an old-school beach-town vibe define this South Carolina barrier island. Whether porch sitting or sandcastle-building, slow afternoons just make sense here. Downtown Charleston 30 min Rainbow Row, the Charleston City Market, cobblestone streets, ghost tours, and horse-drawn carriages are just the beginning. It’s walkable, charming, and filled with little moments you’ll want to tuck away. Shem Creek 16 min Kayakers glide past shrimp boats and waterside restaurants where the catch is always fresh. Come for sunset drinks, stay for dolphin sightings and breezy, local charm.
